bibl.title: Greek and Roman Diplomacy on the Eve of the Second Macedonian War.
bibl.note: A closer examination of an embassy from Ptolemy V to Rome (March 200 B.C.), its purpose and its place in the recently established chronology throws new light on the intentions of certain Romans at a critical point in Rome's dealings with the East.
MEADOWS A.R., Greek and Roman Diplomacy on the Eve of the Second Macedonian War.
